title: Looking for bronze people to come join in on the fun!
body:
Hi there!

Looking for fellow bronze players to possibly make a ranked 5s team or to just play normals with. Would be awesome to have fun and learn the game together :)

please add or send a message to me if you're interested!
IGN: SoftMenstrual

replies.body: I am betting infinite RP that this is a scam, anyone want in?
Nice! I will send you a message and  friend request tonight
Sounds cool. Im quite a low rank though but would love to play some ranked 5's. I've sent you a message and friend request!
